text: Marblehill is an unincorporated community in Pickens County, in the U.S. state of Georgia. ==History== The community was named for a marble quarry near the town site. The name sometimes is spelled out as "Marble Hill". A post office was established at Marblehill in 1889. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Pickens County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Marblehill, Georgia
